canvasJSON:
<mxGraphModel>
  <root>
    <mxCell id="0"/>
    <mxCell id="1" parent="0"/>
    <mxCell id="mySubnet" value="<h5 class="no-selection">mySubnet</h5>" style="shape=cloud" parent="1" vertex="1" type="Network" name="mySubnet">
      <mxGeometry x="120" y="150" width="120" height="120" as="geometry">
        <mxRectangle width="120" height="40" as="alternateBounds"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="ftp_server" value="<h5 id="toptitle" class="no-selection" style="margin:0px;">ftp_server</h5><br><img src="assets/docker_image_icons/host.png" width="48" height="48">" parent="1" vertex="1" connectable="0" type="NetworkElement" name="ftp_server">
      <mxGeometry x="410" y="10" width="120" height="120" as="geometry">
        <mxRectangle width="120" height="40" as="alternateBounds"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="2" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;align=right;imageAlign=right;spacingRight=18" parent="ftp_server" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="ftp_server">
      <mxGeometry y="0.25" width="16" height="16" relative="1" as="geometry">
        <mxPoint x="-6" y="-8" as="offset"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="3" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;align=right;imageAlign=right;spacingRight=18" parent="ftp_server" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="ftp_server">
      <mxGeometry y="0.75" width="16" height="16" relative="1" as="geometry">
        <mxPoint x="-6" y="-4" as="offset"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="4" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;spacingLeft=18" parent="ftp_server" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="ftp_server">
      <mxGeometry x="1" y="0.25" width="16" height="16" relative="1" as="geometry">
        <mxPoint x="-8" y="-8" as="offset"/>

    </mxCell>

      <mxGeometry x="1" y="0.75" width="16" height="16" relative="1" as="geometry">
        <mxPoint x="-8" y="-4" as="offset"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="6" value="" parent="1" source="2" target="mySubnet" edge="1">

    <mxCell id="Alice" value="<h5 id="toptitle" class="no-selection" style="margin:0px;">Alice</h5><br><img src="assets/docker_image_icons/host.png" width="48" height="48">" parent="1" vertex="1" connectable="0" type="NetworkElement" name="Alice">

</mxGraphModel>

addctf.description: Add a ctf in /home/<username> directory inside a secret file
addctf.name: addctf

set_banner.description: Set a banner when user login
set_banner.name: set_banner

addrootctf.name: addrootctf

allow_url_include.description: Set allow url include to On
allow_url_include.name: allow_url_include

create_db.description: Create a new db, insert a name for new db
create_db.name: create_db

sed.description: Replace a string with another inside a file
sed.name: sed

sql_to_db.description: Execute a sql file into a db (you must load a sql file in container first! )
sql_to_db.name: sql_to_db

start_apache_debug.description: Start web server in debug mode (all errors reported)
start_apache_debug.name: start_apache_debug
